Attributes.description: Review of diverse styles of wine with consideration of classic wine-producing areas. Concepts in wine microbiology/chemistry; overview of steps in grape processing for diverse wine styles. Comparison of regulations for Canadian VQA systems with international systems. Wine sensory analysis.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: FNH 330. (and third-year standing or higher.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 18:00, Building: MacMillan, Room: 258
